message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. Given its potential worth to you, I'm asking for $1250000. This price reflects the significant value I'm confident you'll find in this product.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I appreciate your offer, I'm still not quite at a price point that makes this deal work for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1225000.  This reflects a compromise on my side, and I truly believe this product will be a valuable asset for your company.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
